column1: User Message
Hi {agent_name}, this is {lead_first_name}. What can I help you with?

Dear {agent_name},
  
 Hope this email finds you very well.
  View emails from our groups and sales team for proper follow-up to your requests.
  groupspuj@royaltonresorts.com groups2puj@royaltonresorts.com
  
 Best regards,

Hello, 
 

 Please see the attached proposal. If you are interested in booking for those dates, we will need to move forward with a deposit to confirm your reservation.
 

 Thank you,

Dear {agent_name},
  Thank you for contacting {supplier_name}.
  We are delighted to be of service to you.
  We would love to be of assistance to you. We would like to ask for more details of the service needed. Please note that as per policy, we cannot open any link.
  You may help us with the details sent through as an attachment.
  To help you with the actual price quote and to check service availability, may we please have the following information to start with:
  Service Type (Arrival, Departure, or Connection)
  Service airport
  Flight details (flight number, date and time; better if flight itinerary is available)
  Total number of passengers
  Total number of luggages
  Best Regards,
  {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}
  {email}

Hi {agent_name} -
  Please direct all group reservations to myself at manager@baobrewhouse.com 
  Thank you,
  {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

{agent_name}, 
  Hey, just getting back into town. Apologies on the delayed response. Did I at some point sign up for Reposite or do you guys search for specific vendor types in a given area? 
  I popped over to the website and saw the request come through, we can totally put something together for them. We have a couple different cocktail classes we put together that are an absolute blast every time.  
  Can you help me with next steps? 
  Cheers,
  
 

  {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}
  {supplier_name}

I'm not. The person you want to contact for group reservations is Jason Yelton (jason@dbrparkcity.com).
  
 

  He has all the information you'll need for available sections, group sizes, F&B minimums, menu options, etc.
  
 

  Looking forward to working with you, though!
  {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

{agent_name}, 
 

 Yes I'm very much that person indeed! I've been dealing with some personal family issues as of late that have finally come to rest.  
 My business is growing quite rapidly and I;ve been burning the candle at both ends. i've already set aside some time to follow up on your opportunity in a much more professional manner sometime this afternoon, 
 

 Best Regards,
 {lead_first_name}

I received the notification. Wasn't able to login. If you'll send over their contact info, I'd be glad to reach out. 
 

 {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}
we're booked
I'll get to it
what is Reposite
I responded already
too much work

commissionable rate
yea that sounds great

Good morning Dawn, 
  Do you want to reach out and see what he would like. 
  Thank you!  
  {lead_first_name}

Good afternoon, Mr. Bowdin,
  
  Greetings from Group Sales Department from {supplier_name}.
  
  I will be your contact person if you are looking to book 25 rooms and over. Please let me know the date and number of rooms to verify our availability.
  
  I remain attentive to your comments.
  Kind regards / Saludos cordiales,
  {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

No. Thank you for calling our client services team
  
 

  {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

Thank you but I have no interest in paying for a membership to receive work.
  {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

Hey guys,
 Yes, I handle all inquiries and bookings. We don’t do corporate events. Thanks anyway! xo

Hi there,
  
 Thanks for your email. Yes, we already answer the request.
 Thank you.
 Best regards,
 

 {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

Hi {agent_name},
  
 We already use CVENT for group bookings.

I think you may have us confused with another company or group. We are a graphic design and printing company. You can remove our information from your database.
 {lead_first_name}

{agent_name}, 
 

 Yes I'm very much that person indeed! I've been dealing with some personal family issues as of late that have finally come to rest.  
 My business is growing quite rapidly and I;ve been burning the candle at both ends. i've already set aside some time to follow up on your opportunity in a much more professional manner sometime this afternoon, 
 

 Best Regards,
 {lead_first_name}

Hi {agent_name},
 Thank you for reaching out, and I appreciate your warm words regarding our presence on Reposite and the opportunity with {reseller_org_name}.
 

 To provide some insight into our ideal type of group business, we have a strong track record of successfully working with a diverse range of clients, including students, wedding groups, and international groups. We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional experiences tailored to each client's unique needs.
 

 I'd also like to highlight that we have our own fleet of buses, which allows us to ensure top-notch transportation services for our clients. Furthermore, we hold permits for exclusive experiences, such as the bioluminescent bay night kayaking tour, access to El Yunque National Forest, and meet-and-greet services inside the airport terminal. It's important to note that we don't subcontract our services because we are the direct providers, which enables us to maintain strict quality control and a seamless customer experience.
 

 We look forward to exploring potential opportunities on Reposite.
 

 Best regards, 
 {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

Hello {agent_name},  
 I do have a few more questions. 
 How many caterings do you have in my area? In my case, we cover all the city, not just the neighborhood of {destination}, does this changes the price? Is there any kind of security that I will receive at least my investment back in the first year? 
 Thanks 
 {lead_first_name}

Hello
 We only fly 4 to 5 passengers plus the pilot. We specialize in smaller and more personal groups. If you’re looking to fly large groups, call Arizona Balloons.
 Thank you
 {lead_first_name}

Hi {agent_name}, 
 

 Yes, I can help you with group events! Which date are you looking for, and for how many people? What type of event are you looking for? 
 

 Please keep in mind we are not a regular restaurant that accepts dinner reservations; you must book a private event to have the club open past 7:30pm Tuesday-Friday, or any day outside of that. 
 

 Best, 
 {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

Hi {agent_name},  
 we really don't work with any group planners as we can only host six guests for overnight and fourteen for the day trips. We get our business mostly directly through our website and only here and there from agents and some last minute requests from local tour operators. 
 So I am really curious how this could work to our advantage. We would like to extend our advertising in the US and are currently researching what are the most efficient ways to do that. 
 

 Best regards 
 {lead_first_name}

I received the notification. Wasn't able to login. If you'll send over their contact info, I'd be glad to reach out. 
 

 {lead_first_name} {lead_last_name}

Hello {agent_name},
 

 I am afraid we can not supply your request as we have the intuition that what your company wants is us to be registered in your business. I am sorry to inform you that we do not join any unknown business like yours. 
 

 If you want to hire our services please provide the details of your request and we will respond with a quote.
 

 Thank you

Dear {agent_name},
 

 

 Unfortunally the restaurant Cañete doesn't have the capacity to receive a table for that amount of people. Cañete belongs to a restaurant group called Olivé in which there are other restaurants with a similar gastronomic offer in which it does have the capacity for groups.
 

 We leave the link below:
 

 

 Grup Olivé
 

 Sorry for the inconveniences.
 

 Best regards,
 

 

 Abigail Ferrazza

Hi {agent_name}-
 

 Yes we are accepting group reservations-is there a good time to hop on a call to discuss?
 

 Jen
Great, I signed up for a time slot on Friday at 9:15am.

Me again! So I understand correctly using the below rfp as an example.
 

  
 

 Elite Visionary Consulting is requesting a commissionable rate. This means we would pay Elite a commission as well as paying Reposite’s 15% commission, correct?
 

  
 

 Looking forward to any confirmation you can provide,

Hi {agent_name},
  Yes we did receive a request. I have sent a message to the planner and we are waiting on more information from them before we can provide further details.
